Item.name: Depth Cargo Shell
Item.description: A pressure resistant container designed to be compatible with most systems capable of launching depth charges. Useful for safely disposing of hazardous materials or delivering supplies quicky to the outside of the submarine.

Item.name: Railgun Sonar Decoy
Item.aliases: railgun sonar shell, railgun decoy shell, railgun decoy
Item.description: An experimental lure and countermeasure platform, shell comes to rest after traveling about 100m and emits a sonar beacon able to distract most monsters.

Item.name: Nuclear Sonar Decoy
Item.aliases: nuclear sonar shell,nuclear decoy shell,nuclear railgun decoy
Item.description: An experimental lure and countermeasure platform, shell comes to rest after traveling about 100m and emits a sonar beacon able to distract most monsters.

Item.name: Railgun Flechette Shell
Item.description: A specialized railgun shell that when fired bursts into multiple piercing projectiles.

Item.name: Railgun Halfshell Frame
Item.description: A metal frame designed to hold two half-length railgun shells.

Item.name: Railgun Halfshell
Item.description: A half-length railgun shell. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.

Item.name: Physicorium Railgun Halfshell
Item.description: A half-length railgun shell. Although reduced in stopping-power compared to a standard shell, they serve well at reducing cost and saving space.

Item.name: Railgun Homing Shell
Item.aliases: railgun homing shell,homing railgun shell,railgun torpedo
Item.description: A highly advanced railgun shell with thermal tracking and guidance system, will automatically track to nearby hostile life forms when fired.

Item.name: Nuclear Homing Shell
Item.aliases: nuclear homing shell,homing nuclear shell,nuclear torpedo
Item.description: A highly advanced railgun shell with thermal tracking and guidance system, will automatically track to nearby hostile life forms when fired.

Item.name: Railgun Flak Shell
Item.description: A railgun shell designed with multiple outward-facing explosive charges that detonate in sequence. Produces shockwaves capable of rupturing the internal organs of most small creatures, and significantly disorienting larger ones.

Item.name: Railgun Piercing Shell
Item.description: A railgun shell with a kinetic armor-piercing core.

Item.name: Railgun Armor Piercing Explosive Shell
Item.aliases: railgun armor piercing shell, armor piercing railgun shell
Item.description: A railgun shell equipped with an advanced shaped-charge penetrating warhead.

Item.name: Railgun Fusion Shell
Item.description: Railgun shell carrying a devastating boosted-fusion warhead. Delay fuse detonates after approximately 150m of travel.

Item.name: Radiation Depth Charge
Item.description: Experimental depth charge shell equipped with a high-energy radiation emitter. Use of this device in combat is considered a war-crime under coalition law.

Item.name: Railgun Flare Shell
Item.description: A flare projection solution in railgun shell form. When fired, it creates a short line of flares.

Item.name: Railgun Incendiary Shell
Item.description: A railgun shell equipped with an incendiary warhead.

Item.name: Railgun High-Velocity Shell
Item.description: A railgun shell with a flat, long-range trajectory.

Item.name: Cyanide Depth Charge
Item.description: Depth charge equipped with a payload of cyanide, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.

Item.name: Paralyzant Depth Charge
Item.description: Depth charge equipped with a payload of paralyzant, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.

Item.name: Radiotoxin Depth Charge
Item.description: Depth charge equipped with a payload of radiotoxin, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.

Item.name: Flare Depth Charge
Item.description: A flare projection solution in depth-charge form. When fired, it creates a short line of flares.

Item.name: Chaff Depth Charge
Item.description: Passive sonar countermeasure in depth-charge form. Disperses a cloud of sonar-disrupting material in a large area.

Item.name: Railgun Chaff Shell
Item.description: Passive sonar countermeasure in railgun shell form. Disperses a cloud of sonar-disrupting material in a large area.
